attributes.action: Call for Government to fully compensate all medical device victims.
attributes.additional_details:
Medical mesh / Polypropylene 
Is used in many operations for Men,Women,Children,Elderly 
Please sign 
Thanks for your time ☺
attributes.background:
100,000's  of people are suffering and dying due to medical implants. Which have not been fully investigated for safety.
Some not even told or asked for consent. 
Lives have been destroyed .
